languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт несколько мгновений взирает на вас молча.{/n} "Как смеешь ты говорить о Лилэтан, который ты обрекаешь на гибель {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}своим бездействием{/d}? Правительница {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} еще жива... а значит, продолжает отравлять Мировой дух и служить проклятой {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Сай'лантреш{/g}. Когда ты исполнишь то, что должно? Мы умеем ждать, но даже мое терпение подходит к концу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт несколько мгновений взирает на вас молча.{/n} "Как смеешь ты говорить о Лилэтан, который ты обрекаешь на гибель своим бездействием? Правительница {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} еще жива... а значит, продолжает отравлять Мировой дух и служить проклятой {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Сай'лантреш{/g}. Когда ты исполнишь то, что должно? Мы умеем ждать, но даже мое терпение подходит к концу".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet looks at you silently for a few moments.{/n} "How dare you speak of the Lilaethan, after you doomed her with your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}idleness{/d}? The {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} ruler is still alive... which means she continues to poison the World Spirit and serve the cursed {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}. When will you do what you have to do? We know how to wait, but even my patience is coming to an end."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт несколько мгновений взирает на вас молча.{/n} "Как смеешь ты говорить о Лилэтан, который ты обрекаешь на гибель {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}своим бездействием{/d}? Правительница {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} еще жива... а значит, продолжает отравлять Мировой дух и служить проклятой {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Сай'лантреш{/g}. Когда ты исполнишь то, что должно? Мы умеем ждать, но даже мое терпение подходит к концу".

The mon-keigh ruler is still alive... which means she continues to poison the World Spirit and serve the cursed Sai'lanthresh. When will you do what you have to do? We know how to wait, but even my patience is coming to an end."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特静静地盯着你。{/n}“你{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}漫不经心{/d}地决定了莉莱赞的命运，现在居然还敢讨论她的现状？{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}的统治者还活着……这意味着她会继续毒害世界之魂，为该死的{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}赛·兰斯雷什{/g}服务。你究竟什么时候才会做你该做的事情？我们都明白该如何等待，但现在，就算是我的耐心也快要耗尽了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you silently for a few moments.{/n} "How dare you speak of the Lilaethan, after you doomed her with your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}idleness{/d}? The {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} ruler is still alive... which means she continues to poison the World Spirit and serve the cursed {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}. When will you do what you have to do? We know how to wait, but even my patience is coming to an end."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特静静地盯着你。{/n}“你漫不经心地决定了莉莱赞的命运，现在居然还敢讨论她的现状？{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}的统治者还活着……这意味着她会继续毒害世界之魂，为该死的{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}赛·兰斯雷什{/g}服务。你究竟什么时候才会做你该做的事情？我们都明白该如何等待，但现在，就算是我的耐心也快要耗尽了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you silently for a few moments.{/n} "How dare you speak of the Lilaethan, after you doomed her with your idleness? The mon-keigh ruler is still alive... which means she continues to poison the World Spirit and serve the cursed Sai'lanthresh. When will you do what you have to do? We know how to wait, but even my patience is coming to an end."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet te observa en silencio durante unos segundos.{/n} «¿Cómo te atreves a hablar del Lilaethan después de condenarlo con tu {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}inacción{/d}? La gobernante {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} sigue viva... lo que significa que sigue envenenando el espíritu del mundo y sirviendo a la maldita {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}. ¿Cuándo cumplirás con tu deber? Estamos más que capacitados para esperar, pero hasta mi paciencia está llegando a su fin».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you silently for a few moments.{/n} "How dare you speak of the Lilaethan, after you doomed her with your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}idleness{/d}? The {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} ruler is still alive... which means she continues to poison the World Spirit and serve the cursed {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}. When will you do what you have to do? We know how to wait, but even my patience is coming to an end."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet te observa en silencio durante unos segundos.{/n} «¿Cómo te atreves a hablar del Lilaethan después de condenarlo con tu inacción? La gobernante {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} sigue viva... lo que significa que sigue envenenando el espíritu del mundo y sirviendo a la maldita {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}. ¿Cuándo cumplirás con tu deber? Estamos más que capacitados para esperar, pero hasta mi paciencia está llegando a su fin».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはしばらくの間、黙ってあなたを見ていた。{/n}「リラエタンのことをよくも言えたものだ、その{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}怠惰{/d}で彼女を破滅に追いやったのはお前だろう。{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}の支配者はまだ生きている…つまり、彼女は世界の魂を毒し、呪われた{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}セランスレッシュ{/g}に仕え続けているということだ。いつになったらやるべきことをやるのだ？我々は待つということを知ってはいるが、我の忍耐にも限界が来ている」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you silently for a few moments.{/n} "How dare you speak of the Lilaethan, after you doomed her with your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}idleness{/d}? The {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} ruler is still alive... which means she continues to poison the World Spirit and serve the cursed {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}. When will you do what you have to do? We know how to wait, but even my patience is coming to an end."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはしばらくの間、黙ってあなたを見ていた。{/n}「リラエタンのことをよくも言えたものだ、その{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}怠惰{/d}で彼女を破滅に追いやったのはお前だろう。{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}の支配者はまだ生きている…つまり、彼女は世界の魂を毒し、呪われた{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}セランスレッシュ{/g}に仕え続けているということだ。いつになったらやるべきことをやるのだ？我々は待つということを知ってはいるが、我の忍耐にも限界が来ている」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet blickt dich einige Augenblicke lang schweigend an.{/n} "Wie wagt Ihr es, über die Welt der Lileath zu sprechen, nachdem Ihr sie durch Eure {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}Untätigkeit{/d} dem Untergang geweiht habt? Die Herrscherin der {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} lebt noch ... sie vergiftet also weiterhin das Weltenbewusstsein und dient der verfluchten {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}. Wann werdet Ihr tun, was Ihr tun müsst? Wir können warten, doch selbst meine Geduld neigt sich dem Ende zu."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you silently for a few moments.{/n} "How dare you speak of the Lilaethan, after you doomed her with your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}idleness{/d}? The {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} ruler is still alive... which means she continues to poison the World Spirit and serve the cursed {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}. When will you do what you have to do? We know how to wait, but even my patience is coming to an end."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet blickt dich einige Augenblicke lang schweigend an.{/n} "Wie wagt Ihr es, über die Welt der Lileath zu sprechen, nachdem Ihr sie durch Eure Untätigkeit dem Untergang geweiht habt? Die Herrscherin der {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} lebt noch ... sie vergiftet also weiterhin das Weltenbewusstsein und dient der verfluchten {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}. Wann werdet Ihr tun, was Ihr tun müsst? Wir können warten, doch selbst meine Geduld neigt sich dem Ende zu."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet vous observe en silence pendant quelques instants.{/n} « Comment osez-vous parler de la lilaethan, après que vous l'avez condamnée à cause de votre {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}inaction{/d} ? La dirigeante {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} est toujours en vie... ce qui veut dire qu'elle continue à empoisonner l'esprit-monde et à servir la maudite {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}. Quand allez-vous faire le nécessaire ? Les Aeldaris savent attendre, mais ma patience a presque atteint ses limites. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you silently for a few moments.{/n} "How dare you speak of the Lilaethan, after you doomed her with your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}idleness{/d}? The {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} ruler is still alive... which means she continues to poison the World Spirit and serve the cursed {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}. When will you do what you have to do? We know how to wait, but even my patience is coming to an end."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet vous observe en silence pendant quelques instants.{/n} « Comment osez-vous parler de la lilaethan, après que vous l'avez condamnée à cause de votre inaction ? La dirigeante {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} est toujours en vie... ce qui veut dire qu'elle continue à empoisonner l'esprit-monde et à servir la maudite {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}. Quand allez-vous faire le nécessaire ? Les Aeldaris savent attendre, mais ma patience a presque atteint ses limites. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, bir süre sana sessizce bakıyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}Başıboş bırakıp{/d} ölüme mahkûm ettikten sonra Lilaethan hakkında konuşmaya nasıl cüret edersin? İdareci {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} hâlâ hayatta. Bu da demek oluyor ki Dünya Ruhu'nu zehirlemeyi ve kör olası {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh'e{/g} hizmet etmeyi sürdürüyor. Yapman gerekeni yapacağın vakit ne zaman gelecek? Halkım beklemeyi bilir ama benim sabrım bile tükenmek üzere."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you silently for a few moments.{/n} "How dare you speak of the Lilaethan, after you doomed her with your {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}idleness{/d}? The {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} ruler is still alive... which means she continues to poison the World Spirit and serve the cursed {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}. When will you do what you have to do? We know how to wait, but even my patience is coming to an end."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, bir süre sana sessizce bakıyor.{/n} "Başıboş bırakıp ölüme mahkûm ettikten sonra Lilaethan hakkında konuşmaya nasıl cüret edersin? {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Mon-keigh{/g} hükümdarı hâlâ hayatta. Bu da demek oluyor ki Dünya Ruhu'nu zehirlemeyi ve kör olası {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}'e hizmet etmeyi sürdürüyor. Yapman gerekeni yapacağın vakit ne zaman gelecek? Halkım beklemeyi bilir ama benim sabrım bile tükenmek üzere."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
